titleStmt.title: A historicall relation of the famous siege of the Busse, and the suprising of Wesell Together with the articles, and points of composition graunted by his Excellencie the Prince of Orange to those of the towne. And a supposition of the state, and order of their garrison marching out of the city. and some other additions herevnto annexed. Written by H.H. ... .
titleStmt.author: Hexham, Henry, 1585?-1650?

titleStmt.title: A historicall relation of the famous siege of the Busse, and the suprising of Wesell Together with the articles, and points of composition graunted by his Excellencie the Prince of Orange to those of the towne. And a supposition of the state, and order of their garrison marching out of the city. and some other additions herevnto annexed. Written by H.H. ... .
titleStmt.author: Hexham, Henry, 1585?-1650?

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The siege of the Busse, and the surprising of Wesell.

Includes, with caption title, another translation of the second set of articles in STC 11363 ("Articles agreed upon and concluded betweene Grederick Henry, prince of Orange, and the vanquished towne of S' hertogenbosh"), and of all those in STC 11363.5 ("Articles agreed upon and graunted by his excelencie. and the deputies of the United Provinces, unto the clergie, magistrates, of Boisleduke").
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
